results.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
results.plot: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins - a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter

results.title: Psycho
results.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
results.stars: Alfred Hitchcock, Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin

results.title: The Birds
results.plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
results.stars: Alfred Hitchcock, Rod Taylor, Tippi Hedren, Jessica Tandy, Suzanne Pleshette

results.title: Cool Hand Luke
results.plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.
results.stars: Stuart Rosenberg, Paul Newman, George Kennedy, Strother Martin, J.D. Cannon

results.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
results.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
results.stars: Sergio Leone, Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè

results.title: The Magnificent Seven
results.plot: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.
results.stars: John Sturges, Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Eli Wallach

results.title: The Sound of Music
results.plot: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.
results.stars: Robert Wise, Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn

results.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
results.plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.
results.stars: Sergio Leone, Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards

results.title: Planet of the Apes
results.plot: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.
results.stars: Franklin J. Schaffner, Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Maurice Evans

results.title: Lawrence of Arabia
results.plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.
results.stars: David Lean, Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins

results.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
results.plot: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.
results.stars: Robert Mulligan, Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy

results.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
results.plot: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn

results.title: The Graduate
results.plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.
results.stars: Mike Nichols, Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft, Katharine Ross, William Daniels

results.title: Mary Poppins
results.plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.
results.stars: Robert Stevenson, Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, Glynis Johns

results.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
results.plot: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.
results.stars: Robert Aldrich, Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono, Wesley Addy

results.title: Rosemary's Baby
results.plot: A young couple trying for a baby moves into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, where they find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.
results.stars: Roman Polanski, Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer

results.title: Spartacus
results.plot: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Anthony Mann, Kirk Douglas, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton

results.title: Midnight Cowboy
results.plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.
results.stars: John Schlesinger, Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Sylvia Miles, John McGiver

results.title: The Great Escape
results.plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
results.stars: John Sturges, Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson

results.title: The Jungle Book
results.plot: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.
results.stars: Wolfgang Reitherman, Phil Harris, Sebastian Cabot, Louis Prima, Bruce Reitherman

results.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
results.plot: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.
results.stars: George Roy Hill, Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin

results.title: A Fistful of Dollars
results.plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
results.stars: Sergio Leone, Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria Volontè, Marianne Koch, Wolfgang Lukschy

results.title: For a Few Dollars More
results.plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.
results.stars: Sergio Leone, Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volontè, Mara Krupp

results.title: Doctor Zhivago
results.plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.
results.stars: David Lean, Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Geraldine Chaplin, Rod Steiger

results.title: The Wild Bunch
results.plot: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.
results.stars: Sam Peckinpah, William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Edmond O'Brien

results.title: Goldfinger
results.plot: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.
results.stars: Guy Hamilton, Sean Connery, Gert Fröbe, Honor Blackman, Shirley Eaton

results.title: Harakiri
results.plot: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.
results.stars: Masaki Kobayashi, Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama, Shima Iwashita, Tetsurô Tanba

results.title: Bonnie and Clyde
results.plot: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.
results.stars: Arthur Penn, Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman

results.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
results.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.
results.stars: Stanley Kramer, Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark, Marlene Dietrich

results.title: My Fair Lady
results.plot: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.
results.stars: George Cukor, Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison, Stanley Holloway, Wilfrid Hyde-White

results.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
results.plot: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.
results.stars: John Ford, James Stewart, John Wayne, Vera Miles, Lee Marvin

results.title: The Apartment
results.plot: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
results.stars: Billy Wilder, Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston

results.title: Persona
results.plot: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.
results.stars: Ingmar Bergman, Bibi Andersson, Liv Ullmann, Margaretha Krook, Gunnar Björnstrand

results.title: 8½
results.plot: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
results.stars: Federico Fellini, Marcello Mastroianni, Anouk Aimée, Claudia Cardinale, Sandra Milo

results.title: Charade
results.plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?
results.stars: Stanley Donen, Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn, Walter Matthau, James Coburn

results.title: Night of the Living Dead
results.plot: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.
results.stars: George A. Romero, Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea, Karl Hardman, Marilyn Eastman

results.title: In the Heat of the Night
results.plot: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.
results.stars: Norman Jewison, Sidney Poitier, Rod Steiger, Warren Oates, Lee Grant

results.title: Belle de Jour
results.plot: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.
results.stars: Luis Buñuel, Catherine Deneuve, Jean Sorel, Michel Piccoli, Geneviève Page

results.title: La Dolce Vita
results.plot: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.
results.stars: Federico Fellini, Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux

results.title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
results.plot: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.
results.stars: Mike Nichols, Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, George Segal, Sandy Dennis

results.title: The Longest Day
results.plot: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.
results.stars: Ken Annakin, Andrew Marton, Gerd Oswald, Bernhard Wicki, Darryl F. Zanuck, John Wayne, Robert Ryan, Richard Burton, Henry Fonda

results.title: The Dirty Dozen
results.plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.
results.stars: Robert Aldrich, Lee Marvin, Ernest Borgnine, Charles Bronson, John Cassavetes

results.title: In Cold Blood
results.plot: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.
results.stars: Richard Brooks, Robert Blake, Scott Wilson, John Forsythe, Paul Stewart

results.title: Yojimbo
results.plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.
results.stars: Akira Kurosawa, Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa

results.title: Breathless
results.plot: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.
results.stars: Jean-Luc Godard, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Seberg, Van Doude

results.title: High and Low
results.plot: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.
results.stars: Akira Kurosawa, Toshirô Mifune, Yutaka Sada, Tatsuya Nakadai, Kyôko Kagawa

results.title: Zulu
results.plot: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.
results.stars: Cy Endfield, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, James Booth

results.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
results.plot: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.
results.stars: Stanley Kramer, Spencer Tracy, Sidney Poitier, Katharine Hepburn, Katharine Houghton

results.title: The Manchurian Candidate
results.plot: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.
results.stars: John Frankenheimer, Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, Angela Lansbury

results.title: The Hustler
results.plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.
results.stars: Robert Rossen, Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie, George C. Scott
